check.description: Check if files are formatted, also show statistics

write.description: Format and write files in place

listDifferent.description: List files that would be changed

ignorePath.description: Path to ignore file(s). Can be specified multiple times. If not specified, .gitignore and .prettierignore in the current directory are used.

withNodeModules.description: Format code in node_modules directory (skipped by default)

noErrorOnUnmatchedPattern.description: Do not exit with error when pattern is unmatched

threads.description: Number of threads to use. Set to 1 for using only 1 CPU core.

additionalArguments.description: Additional arguments to pass to oxfmt
